Generated Narrative: CapabilityStatement ror-serveur-prod

Serveur de prod ROR 3.2

  • Implementation Guide Version: 0.4.0-snapshot-2
  • FHIR Version: 4.0.1
  • Supported Formats: application/fhir+xml, xml, application/fhir+json, json
  • Supported Patch Formats:
  • Published on: 2024-07-29 09:03:47+0000
  • Published by: ANS

Note to Implementers: FHIR Capabilities

Any FHIR capability may be 'allowed' by the system unless explicitly marked as 'SHALL NOT'. A few items are marked as MAY in the Implementation Guide to highlight their potential relevance to the use case.

FHIR RESTful Capabilities

Mode: server

Summary of System-wide Interactions

Capabilities by Resource/Profile

Summary

The summary table lists the resources that are part of this configuration, and for each resource it lists:

  • The relevant profiles (if any)
  • The interactions supported by each resource (Read, Search, Update, and Create, are always shown, while VRead, Patch, Delete, History on Instance, or History on Type are only present if at least one of the resources has support for them.
  • The required, recommended, and some optional search parameters (if any).
  • The linked resources enabled for _include
  • The other resources enabled for _revinclude
  • The operations on the resource (if any)

The ID of the resource

SHALL_lastUpdateddate

SHALL_tagtoken
SHALLadditional-bed-typetoken
SHALLaddress-citystring

A city specified in an address

SHALLaddress-postalcodestring

A postal code specified in an address

SHALLcapacity-closing-typetoken
SHALLcapacity-statustoken
SHALLcapacity-typetoken
SHALLcapacity-update-datedate
SHALLcommune-cogtoken
SHALLcrisis-typetoken

SHALLequipment-typetoken
SHALLgender-capacity-availabletoken
SHALLidentifiertoken

An identifier for the location

SHALLlimit-valuequantity
SHALLnb-capacitynumber
SHALLnearspecial

Search for locations where the location.position is near to, or within a specified distance of, the provided coordinates expressed as [latitude]|[longitude]|[distance]|[units] (using the WGS84 datum, see notes). If the units are omitted, then kms should be assumed. If the distance is omitted, then the server can use its own discretion as to what distances should be considered near (and units are irrelevant)

Servers may search using various techniques that might have differing accuracies, depending on implementation efficiency.

Requires the near-distance parameter to be provided also

SHALLnear-insee-codespecial
SHALLresidential-numbernumber
SHALLresidential-typetoken
SHALLstatustoken

Searches for locations with a specific kind of status

SHALLtemporality-capacitytoken
SHALLtemporary-assignementtoken
SHALLtypetoken

A code for the type of location

searchParam.name: near
searchParam.documentation:
Search for locations where the location.position is near to, or within a specified distance of, the provided coordinates expressed as [latitude]|[longitude]|[distance]|[units] (using the WGS84 datum, see notes).
If the units are omitted, then kms should be assumed. If the distance is omitted, then the server can use its own discretion as to what distances should be considered near (and units are irrelevant)

Servers may search using various techniques that might have differing accuracies, depending on implementation efficiency.

Requires the near-distance parameter to be provided also

searchParam.documentation: A code for the type of location

searchParam.documentation: Any identifier for the organization (not the accreditation issuer's identifier)

searchParam.documentation: A portion of the organization's name or alias
